description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。邓小平之女，籍贯四川广安。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Chinese Communist Party. She is the daughter of Deng Xiaoping. Her ancestral home is Guang'an, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary and statesman who was the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠的丈夫，毕业于北京大学。
description.en: Husband of Deng Nan, graduate of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠与张宏的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Deng Nan and Zhang Hong.

description.zh-cn: 安邦保险董事长兼CEO，邓卓芮的丈夫。
description.en: Chairman and CEO of Anbang Insurance, husband of Deng Zhuorui.

description.zh-cn: 河北省下辖的县，邓楠的出生地。
description.en: A county in Hebei province, the birthplace of Deng Nan.

nodes.id: 北京师范大学附属实验中学

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属实验中学
en: The High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所中学，邓楠于1964年在此高中毕业。
description.en: A high school located in Beijing, China, from which Deng Nan graduated in 1964.

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major comprehensive research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1966年至1976年间发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A sociopolitical movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 until 1976.

nodes.id: 中国科学院自动化研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院自动化研究所
en: Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院下属的研究机构。
description.en: A research institute under the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

nodes.id: 中国科学院半导体研究所

zh-cn: 中国科学院半导体研究所
en: Institute of Semiconductors, Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院下属的研究机构。
description.en: A research institute under the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国科学技术部
中华人民共和国科学技术委员会
en: Ministry of Science and Technology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管科学技术工作的组成部门。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that manages science and technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织，是中国政治生活中发扬社会主义民主的一种重要形式。
description.en: The patriotic united front organization of the Chinese people, an important form of promoting socialist democracy in China's political life.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科学技术工作者的群众组织，是中国人民政治协商会议的组成单位之一。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese scientific and technological workers, and a constituent unit of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会
en: 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会选举产生的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 17th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 江苏省下辖的地级市，张宏的出生地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Jiangsu province, the birthplace of Zhang Hong.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区，邓卓芮的出生地。
description.en: A province-level administrative region of the People's Republic of China, the birthplace of Deng Zhuorui.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠是邓小平的女儿。
description.en: Deng Nan is the daughter of Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于1945年10月15日出生于河北省涉县。
description.en: Deng Nan was born on October 15, 1945, in She County, Hebei Province.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学附属实验中学

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于1964年毕业于北京师范大学附属实验中学（原师大女附中）。
description.en: Deng Nan graduated from The High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University (formerly the Girls' High School Affiliated to Beijing Normal University) in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于1970年毕业于北京大学物理系。
description.en: Deng Nan graduated from the Department of Physics at Peking University in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，邓楠在陕西汉中地区劳动，中断了正常的学术或职业发展。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Deng Nan labored in the Hanzhong area of Shaanxi, which interrupted her normal academic or professional development.

relationships.target: 中国科学院自动化研究所

description.zh-cn: 邓楠曾在中国科学院自动化研究所任研究实习员。
description.en: Deng Nan once served as a research intern at the Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

relationships.target: 中国科学院半导体研究所

description.zh-cn: 邓楠曾在中国科学院半导体研究所任研究实习员。
description.en: Deng Nan once served as a research intern at the Institute of Semiconductors, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国科学技术部

description.zh-cn: 邓楠曾任原国家科委政策局副局长、社会发展司司长，1991年11月任国家科委副主任，1998年4月出任改组后的科学技术部副部长，直至2004年10月调任中国科协。
description.en: Deng Nan served as Deputy Director of the Policy Bureau and Director of the Department of Social Development of the former State Science and Technology Commission (SSTC), became Vice Chairman of the SSTC in November 1991, and was appointed Vice Minister of the reorganized Ministry of Science and Technology in April 1998, a position she held until she was transferred to the China Association for Science and Technology in October 2004.

position.zh-cn: 党组书记、书记处第一书记、常务副主席
position.en: Party Group Secretary, First Secretary of the Secretariat, Executive Vice Chairman

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于2004年10月至2011年4月在中国科学技术协会担任党组书记、书记处第一书记、常务副主席等职务。
description.en: From October 2004 to April 2011, Deng Nan served in various roles at the China Association for Science and Technology, including Party Group Secretary, First Secretary of the Secretariat, and Executive Vice Chairman.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十七届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于2007年10月当选为中国共产党第十七届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Deng Nan was elected as a member of the 17th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party in October 2007.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

position.zh-cn: 委员、常务委员、教科文卫体委员会副主任
position.en: Member, Standing Committee Member, Vice Director of the Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports

description.zh-cn: 邓楠于2003年当选第十届全国政协委员，2011年增补为第十一届全国政协委员、教科文卫体委员会副主任，2013年当选第十二届全国政协常委及科教文卫体委员会副主任。
description.en: Deng Nan was elected as a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC in 2003, was added as a member of the 11th National Committee and Vice Director of its Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports in 2011, and was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 12th National Committee and Vice Director of its Committee for Education, Science, Culture, Health and Sports in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 张宏是邓楠的丈夫。
description.en: Zhang Hong is the husband of Deng Nan.

description.zh-cn: 邓卓芮是邓楠的女儿。
description.en: Deng Zhuorui is the daughter of Deng Nan.

description.zh-cn: 邓卓芮是张宏的女儿。
description.en: Deng Zhuorui is the daughter of Zhang Hong.

description.zh-cn: 邓卓芮是吴小晖的第三任妻子。
description.en: Deng Zhuorui is the third wife of Wu Xiaohui.

description.zh-cn: 邓卓芮于1972年11月14日出生于江西。
description.en: Deng Zhuorui was born on November 14, 1972, in Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 张宏毕业于北京大学。
description.en: Zhang Hong graduated from Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 张宏出生于江苏省泰州。
description.en: Zhang Hong was born in Taizhou, Jiangsu province.

description.zh-cn: 邓楠是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Deng Nan is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.
